GET /api.description: responds with a json object containing details of each endpoint

GET /api/topics.description: responds with an array of all topics

topics.description: The man, the Mitch, the legend

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: responds with the details of the specified article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: responds with an array of all articles, omitting the article body

articles.author: icellusedkars
articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: responds with an array of comments for a given article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts the new comment and responds with the posted comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: adjusts the article votes and responds with the updated article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the comment and responds with no content

GET /api/users.description: responds with an array of all users
